results.title: Effect of high fat diet and excessive compressive mechanical force on pathologic changes of temporomandibular joint
results.text_hl: Mechanical force induced @<m>DISEASE_Temporomandibular_Joint_Dysfunction_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013706 @@@TMJOA@@@-like damages were exacerbated by high fat diet and alleviated by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Du J, Jiang Q, Mei L, Yang R, Wen J, Lin S, Li H. Effect of high fat diet and excessive compressive mechanical force on pathologic changes of temporomandibular joint Sci Rep. 2020 Oct 15;10(1):17457. PMID: 33060739
citations.BibTeX: @article{33060739, title={Effect of high fat diet and excessive compressive mechanical force on pathologic changes of temporomandibular joint}, author={Du J and Jiang Q and Mei L and Yang R and Wen J and Lin S and Li H}, journal={Sci Rep}, volume={10}, number={1}, pages={17457}}

results.title: The impact of simvastatin intervention on the healing of bone, soft tissue, and TMJ cartilage in dentistry: a systematic review and meta-analysis
results.text_hl: Data on the comparison of topical/systemic @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on bone healing in intrabony and furcation defects, extraction sockets, distraction osteogenesis, as well as soft tissue healing in mucogingival grafting procedures and cartilage protection in @<m>DISEASE_Temporomandibular_Joint_Dysfunction_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013706 @@@TMJ arthritis@@@ were extracted from all the eligible studies.

citations.NLM: Gupta S, Del Fabbro M, Chang J. The impact of simvastatin intervention on the healing of bone, soft tissue, and TMJ cartilage in dentistry: a systematic review and meta-analysis Int J Implant Dent. 2019 Apr 9;5(1):17. PMID: 30963362
citations.BibTeX: @article{30963362, title={The impact of simvastatin intervention on the healing of bone, soft tissue, and TMJ cartilage in dentistry: a systematic review and meta-analysis}, author={Gupta S and Del Fabbro M and Chang J}, journal={Int J Implant Dent}, volume={5}, number={1}, pages={17}}

results.title: Effect of simvastatin injections on temporomandibular joint inflammation in growing rats.
results.text_hl: Effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ injections on @<m>DISEASE_Temporomandibular_Joint_Dysfunction_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013706 @@@temporomandibular joint inflammation@@@ in growing @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: George MD, Owen CM, Reinhardt AL, Giannini PJ, Marx DB, Reinhardt RA. Effect of simvastatin injections on temporomandibular joint inflammation in growing rats. J Oral Maxillofac Surg. 2013 May;71(5):846-53. PMID: 23434172
citations.BibTeX: @article{23434172, title={Effect of simvastatin injections on temporomandibular joint inflammation in growing rats.}, author={George MD and Owen CM and Reinhardt AL and Giannini PJ and Marx DB and Reinhardt RA}, journal={J Oral Maxillofac Surg}, volume={71}, number={5}, pages={846-53}}

results.title: Impact of local steroid or statin treatment of experimental temporomandibular joint arthritis on bone growth in young rats.
results.text_hl: The purpose of this study was to compare @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (a @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@-lowering drug that reduces @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@TMJ inflammation@@@) with the @CHEMICAL_Steroids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013256 @@@steroid@@@ @CHEMICAL_triamcinolone_hexacetonide @CHEMICAL_MESH:C005900 @@@triamcinolone hexacetonide@@@ in experimental @<m>DISEASE_Temporomandibular_Joint_Dysfunction_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013706 @@@TMJ arthritis@@@.

citations.NLM: Holwegner C, Reinhardt AL, Schmid MJ, Marx DB, Reinhardt RA. Impact of local steroid or statin treatment of experimental temporomandibular joint arthritis on bone growth in young rats. Am J Orthod Dentofacial Orthop. 2015 Jan;147(1):80-8. PMID: 25533075
citations.BibTeX: @article{25533075, title={Impact of local steroid or statin treatment of experimental temporomandibular joint arthritis on bone growth in young rats.}, author={Holwegner C and Reinhardt AL and Schmid MJ and Marx DB and Reinhardt RA}, journal={Am J Orthod Dentofacial Orthop}, volume={147}, number={1}, pages={80-8}}
